about_the_game:
Eat your foes, try not to get eaten yourself. This smash-like brawler will leave your jaw dropped and saliva dripping. Inspired by Joust, the retro game where it's difficult to move and fun to play!

Take A Little is a small indie multiplayer game. Fight other people online using strategy and your fork. Either stab and eat your opponents or launch your weapon to skewer enemies and retrieve it before your enemy grabs your weapon and consumes it!

Features:
  • Character Customizer - Various pixel art food characters at your disposal.
  • Fork - Destroy your enemies by prodding at them.
  • Throwing - Launch your weapon at opponents to take a chunk of them with it!
  • Consume - After taking a chunk of your least favorite enemy, consume their flesh to heal your own.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: None

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Smash-Bros like action multiplayer game where you consume your fellow food in a hectic city scape. Become the last winning food on top and claim your crown. Movement is similar to Joust and will how you gliding around with a jetpack while dodging opponent advances.
